titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain Federal land to the City of The Dalles, Oregon.
To direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain Federal land to the City of The Dalles, Oregon.
The Dalles Watershed Development Act
Dalles Watershed Development Act
Dalles Watershed Development Act
Dalles Watershed Development Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute by Unanimous Consent.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 119-277.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 233.

action.text: Mr. Hurd (CO) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 655.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Discharged, Referred To
